Caption:
As reported by Abu Huraira, when a man asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) “Who is most deserving of my good company?” The Prophet said, “Your mother.” The man asked, “Then who?” The Prophet said “Your mother.” The man asked again, “Then who?” The Prophet said, “Your mother.” The man asked again, “Then who?” The Prophet said, “Your father.” (Sahih Bukhari and Muslim)

The Prophet Muhammad (ﷺ) also said, “Paradise lies at the feet of mothers.” (Sunan Ibn Majah)

In Islam everyday is Mothers Day.

Caption:
بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ
சகோதரிகளே!
 மதீனா அரபி முதல் புத்தகத்தை முடுத்தவர்களா நீங்கள்?

இரண்டாம் பாகத்தை இலக்கணத்துடன் கற்க விழைபவர்களா நீங்கள்?_

நேரடி வகுப்புகளுக்கு செல்ல முடியவில்லையா

கவலை வேண்டாம்...
வீட்டில் இருந்தபடியே ஆன்லைன் வகுப்புகள் மூலம் எளிமையாக அரபி இலக்கணத்தை கற்றுக்கொள்ளலாம்...
 

மிக குறைந்த கட்டணத்தில் இரண்டாம் பாகத்திற்கான வகுப்புகள் துவங்க உள்ளது

இன் ஷா அல்லாஹ்...

*اِنَّاۤ اَنْزَلْنٰهُ قُرْءٰنًا عَرَبِيًّا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُوْنَ‏*

இதனை (அரபிகளாகிய) நீங்கள் நன்கு புரிந்து கொள்ளும் பொருட்டு குர்ஆனாக அரபிமொழியில் திண்ணமாக நாம் இறக்கிவைத்துள்ளோம்.
(அல்குர்ஆன் : 12:2)

 
இன்றே தொடர்பு கொள்ளுங்கள்

Caption:
Shaykh al-Islam Mustafa Sabri Efendi, der Gelehrte und Mujahid seines Jahrhunderts, befasst sich in diesem wichtigen Buch mit der Frage des Kalifats im Islam aus fiqh- und politischer Perspektive, in dem er alle Tricks und Tricks der Feinde des Kalifats enthüllt in der Türkei und der arabischen Welt. Mit einem diskussions- und kritikorientierten Stil beleuchtet er die aktuellen Diskussionsthemen der Zeit.

Es präsentiert dem Leser die politischen Ereignisse, die während der Zeit des Werkes und der Abschaffung des Kalifats stattfanden, mit reichhaltigem Material, um sich in der Geschichte einen Namen zu machen. In dem Werk vermittelt der Autor die Botschaft, dass Muslime für eine glänzende Zukunft des Islam zum Kalifat zurückkehren sollten.

Caption:
#Israele #Libano 

L’organizzazione terroristica di #Hezbollah conferma ufficialmente: #Nasrallah è stato eliminato ❌ 

Sua Eminenza Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah, Segretario Generale di Hezbollah, si è unito ai suoi compagni, i grandi e immortali martiri di cui ha guidato il viaggio per quasi trent’anni, durante i quali li ha condotti di vittoria in vittoria, succedendo al maestro dei martiri della resistenza dell’#Islam nel 1992 fino alla liberazione del Libano nel 2000 e alla vittoria divinamente sostenuta nel 2006 e tutte le altre battaglie d’onore e di redenzione, fino alla battaglia di sostegno e di eroismo a sostegno della #Palestina, di #Gaza e dei palestinesi oppressi.

Caption:
🌟 Bedürfnisorientierte Erziehung: Ein Weg zu glücklichen Kindern!🌟

In der heutigen schnelllebigen Welt ist es wichtiger denn je, die Bedürfnisse unserer Kinder wahr- und ernstzunehmen.

ℹ️Die bedürfnisorientierte Erziehung basiert auf dem Verständnis, dass jedes Kind einzigartige Bedürfnisse hat, die es zu erkennen und zu respektieren gilt.

✴️Auch unerwünschtes Verhalten unserer Kinder hat seinen Ursprung oftmals in unerfüllten Bedürfnissen und die Bedürfnisse dahinter zu erkennen kann schwierig sein.

🚫Außerdem sollten wir uns nicht zu Fehler verleiten lassen, weil wir versuchen den Bedürfnissen unserer Kinder nachzukommen.

✅Was genau die Bedürfnisorientierte Erziehung ist, welche Nutzen sie hat und welche Fehler wir vermeiden tollen, all das erfährst du in diesem Beitrag.

❓Erziehst du dein Kind bedürfnisorientiert?
❓Welche Schwierigkeiten treten dabei auf?
❓Welche Vorteile siehst du in dieser Erziehungshaltung?

➡️ Teile deine Antworten auf diese Fragen gerne in den Kommentaren. ⬅️

#tarbiyah #barakahinstitut #erziehung #kinder #islam #muslim #muslimah #boerziehung #familie

Caption:
Shaykh al-Islam Mustafa Sabri Efendi, der Gelehrte und Mujahid seines Jahrhunderts, befasst sich in diesem wichtigen Buch mit der Frage des Kalifats im Islam aus fiqh- und politischer Perspektive, in dem er alle Tricks und Tricks der Feinde des Kalifats enthüllt in der Türkei und der arabischen Welt. Mit einem diskussions- und kritikorientierten Stil beleuchtet er die aktuellen Diskussionsthemen der Zeit.

Es präsentiert dem Leser die politischen Ereignisse, die während der Zeit des Werkes und der Abschaffung des Kalifats stattfanden, mit reichhaltigem Material, um sich in der Geschichte einen Namen zu machen. In dem Werk vermittelt der Autor die Botschaft, dass Muslime für eine glänzende Zukunft des Islam zum Kalifat zurückkehren sollten.

Caption:
Show me something more beautiful than this... there's none.♥️
I feel like there is no more beautiful way to show your love, care, and bond than by remembering you wherever one goes.

Dated: 29 Aug 2024

It's heartwarming to see how friendships can endure even when life takes us on different paths. Your university friend goes for Umrah and captures such a beautiful pic at the Holy Kaaba for you. That's precious!✨️♥️

My university friend went for Umrah, and while there, she made this beautiful picture in front of the Holy Kaabah. I’m so happy that she remembered me in such a sacred place.😌

It's beautiful and truly precious to maintain a bond as when we're not together, not meeting daily or talking every other day, we still hold this precious place in each others hearts.

Insha'Allah, one day I will also be there, performing Umrah/Hajj. Insha'Allah ♥️🙏

Thank you, my friend, for this previous gift and for remembering me in that Holy Place. This means the world to me♥️

Caption:
“Bir yağmur bizi alıp biraz uzağa götürür. Bir ay, bir güneş tutulması, birden bizi değiştirir. Bir hastalık, ayrı bir dünyada yüzdürür ve gezdirir. Namaz, bir miraç olur insana. Kur’ân öteye açılmış bir kapıdır. Din, başlı başına bir ‘mucize dünyası’nı getirir bize. Mucize, Peygamberin miracı, Ayın ikiye bölünmesi, Allah sevgisi, kerametler… İşte, bu dünyayı bize çekilir kılan, görünmeyen dünyadan dünyamıza düşmüş bağışlar…”
|Sezai Karakoç

وَعَنْهُ ، قَالَ : كَانَ رسُولُ اللهِ – صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ – يَقُوْلُ : (( اللَّهُمَّ أصْلِحْ لِي دِيْنِيَ الَّذِي هُوَ عِصْمَةُ أَمْرِي ، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي دُنْيَايَ الَّتِي فِيهَا مَعَاشِي ، وَأَصْلِحْ لِي آخِرتِي الَّتي فِيهَا مَعَادِي ، وَاجْعَلِ الحَيَاةَ زِيَادَةً لِي فِي كُلِّ خَيْرٍ ، وَاجْعَلِ المَوتَ رَاحَةً لِي مِنْ كُلِّ شَرٍّ )) . رَوَاهُ مُسْلِمٌ.

Dari Abu Hurairah radhiyallahu ‘anhu, ia berkata bahwa Rasulullah shallallahu ‘alaihi wa sallam mengucapkan,

ALLOOHUMMA ASHLIH LII DIINIYALLADZII HUWA ‘ISHMATU AMRII, WA ASHLIH LII DUN-YAAYALLATII FIIHAA MA’AASYII, WA ASH-LIH LII AAKHIROTIILLATII FIIHAA MA’AADII, WAJ’ALIL HAYAATA ZIYAADATAN LII FII KULLI KHOIRIN, WAJ’ALIL MAUTA ROOHATAN LII MIN KULLI SYARRIN.

Artinya: Ya Allah, perbaikilah bagiku agamaku yang menjadi pegangan urusanku; perbaikilah bagiku duniaku yang menjadi tempat kehidupanku; perbaikilah bagiku akhiratku yang menjadi tempat kembaliku; serta jadikanlah kehidupanku mempunyai nilai tambah bagiku dalam segala kebaikan dan kematianku sebagai kebebasanku dari segala keburukan. (HR. Muslim, no. 2720)

Caption:
18. Hayır (sandıkları gibi değil!) iyilerin yazısı "İlliyyûn"dadır.

19. "İlliyyûn"un ne olduğunu sen ne bileceksin.

20. O, yazılmış bir kitaptır.

21. Ona, Allah'a yakın olanlar şâhit olur.

22. Şüphesiz iyi kimseler, Naîm cennetindedirler.

23. Koltuklar üzerinde, (etrafı) seyrederler.

24. Onların yüzlerinde, nimetlerin sevincini görürsün.

25. Onlara, mühürlü (el değmemiş) saf bir içecekten içirilir.

26. Onun (içiminin) sonu bir misktir (ağızda misk gibi koku bırakır). İşte yarışanlar, bunun için yarışsınlar.(1) #HatSanatı#Hüsnihat#Nesih#naksh#Islamiccalligraphy #Islam#müslim#Kuran#müsluman#siparişalınır

Caption:
Show me something more beautiful than this... there's none, for sure.♥️
I feel like there is no more beautiful way to show your love, care, and bond than by remembering you wherever one goes.

Dated: 29 Aug 2024

It's heartwarming to see how friendships can endure even when life takes us on different paths. Your university friend goes for Umrah and captures such a beautiful pic at the Holy Kaaba for you. That's precious!✨️♥️

My university friend went for Umrah, and while there, she made this beautiful picture in front of the Holy Kaabah. I’m so happy that she remembered me in such a sacred place.😌

It's beautiful and truly precious to maintain a bond as when we're not together, not meeting daily or talking every other day, we still hold this precious place in each others hearts.

Insha'Allah, one day I will also be there, performing Umrah/Hajj. Insha'Allah ♥️🙏

Thank you, my friend, for this previous gift and for remembering me in that Holy Place. This means the world to me♥️

Caption:
Ada beberapa bentuk dosa ketika seseorang menyebarkan gambar atau video porno di dunia maya,

Pertama, masuk dalam ancaman di surat an-Nur,

إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُحِبُّونَ أَنْ تَشِيعَ الْفَاحِشَةُ فِي الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ

Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang ingin agar perbuatan yang amat keji itu tersebar di kalangan orang-orang yang beriman, bagi mereka azab yang pedih di dunia dan di akhirat.. (QS. an-Nur: 19)

Allah berfirman,

لِيَحْمِلُوا أَوْزَارَهُمْ كَامِلَةً يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ وَمِنْ أَوْزَارِ الَّذِينَ يُضِلُّونَهُمْ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ أَلَا سَاءَ مَا يَزِرُونَ

(ucapan mereka) menyebabkan mereka memikul dosa-dosanya sepenuhnya pada hari kiamat, dan sebagian dosa-dosa orang yang mereka sesatkan yang tidak mengetahui sedikitpun (bahwa mereka disesatkan). Ingatlah, amat buruklah dosa yang mereka pikul itu (QS. an-Nahl: 25)

Lalu bagaimana cara taubatnya?
[1] Menyesali dengan sungguh-sungguh terhadap kesalahan yang dia lakukan.
[2] Bertekad untuk tidak mengulanginya.
[3] Dekatkan diri dengan banyak beribadah kepada Allah.
[4] Bersihkan video atau gambar porno yang pernah disebarkan dari sumbernya.. terutama di medsos, sebisa yang anda lakukan. Sementara yang dicopas orang lain, anda minta kepada yang bersangkutan untuk menghapusnya.
[5] Lakukan amal soleh kebalikannya.
sumber : https://konsultasisyariah.com/31370-cara-taubat-menyebarkan-video-porno.html

Caption:
رَبِّ إِنِّي لِمَا أَنْزَلْتَ إِلَيَّ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَقِيرٌ♥️

My ALLAH, indeed I am, for whatever good You would send down to me, in need.♥️
📔Musa was in need of food, water, shelter, a family, and safety. With one prayer he was granted all of that. 

📔The dua “Rabbi inni lima anzalta ilayya min khayrin faqir” is just the most beautiful and powerful Dua there is. You are basically asking Allah to send any type of good your way that you are in need of and trust Him you will get some news in some form very shortly after. 
📔Recite this dua whenever ur heart feels uneasy, whenever you’re in desperate need of something good to happen, recite this dua with full conviction that Allah swt is listening and will respond.

Caption:
Bismillah,Tetap berbakti kepada orang tua walaupun sudah menikah
.
Pernikahan yang dijalin dari sepasang perempuan dan laki-laki memiliki tanggung jawab dan peran yang berbeda.

Saat seseorang memutuskan untuk menikah, tentu ia akan memiliki peran yang bertambah.

Jika sebelumnya seorang anak perempuan harus patuh dan taat kepada orang tuanya, setelah menikah maka ia harus taat kepada suaminya.

Namun, bagaimana kedudukan orang tua suami (mertua) dan orang tua sendiri?

Salah satu jamaah menanyakan mengenai hadist yang menerangkan kedudukan antara orang tua dan mertua kepada Ustadz Khalid Basalamah.

“Sama saja. Tetap orang tua diprioritaskan. Mertua itu umum, kerabat, kita berbuat baik karena punya hubungan kerabat dengan pasangan hidup kita. Jadi berbeda, tidak sama seperti kedudukan orang tua” ungkap Ustadz Khalid Basalamah dilansir PortalJember.com dari kanal Youtube Lentera Islam dari video tanggal 28 April 2016.

Menurutnya, apabila mertua meminta sesuatu, sebagai menantu masih bisa menolak jika memang ada sesuatu kebutuhan diri sendiri yang harus dipenuhi.

Namun, jika orang tua yang meminta, sebagai anak tidak bisa menolak.

Jika menolak akan menjadi dosa karena berbakti kepada orang tua adalah kewajiban dan hal ini tidak berlaku kepada mertua.

@sunnahfiqih 

Sumber....

Caption:
HAYA ( MODESTY ) : A precious gem that reflects the purity and grace of one's character. It's not just in attire, but in speech, actions, and thoughts.

"O Prophet! Tell the believing men to lower their gaze and guard their chastity. That is purer for them. Surely Rabb is All Aware of what they do. And say to the believing women that they should lower their gaze and guard their modesty; that they should not display their beauty and ornaments except what (must ordinarily) appear thereof;..." ------ 24:30-31

Caption: Maine bhtt khalis dil se, bhtt shiddat se mngaa hai iss duaa ko. Faaslaa jitna bhi hai maine apne dil ko wahan se kbhi door mehsoos nahi kiya, jb bhi zikr kiya, jb bhi duaa ki khud ko wahan se qareeb mehsoos kiya. Jb mai yahan ke liye tadap kr roti hu to mujhe har khawahish mamuli lgti hai, aisa lgta hai ke mai har khwahish, har chahat ko qurban kr skti hu sirf ek nazar madine ko dekhne ke liye. Mai janti hu, mere jaise na jaane kitne hai jo wahan jane ke liye tadapte hai, jinhe rihaayi chahiye apne khayalon se, jinhone apne aansu sambhaal rkhe hai uss safar ke dauraan bahane ke liye, jinhone har qubooliyat ke waqt me mangaa hai iss duaa ko aur asbaab na hone ke bawajood iss chahat ko apni dil ki sb se badi chahat bana rkha hai.\nWritten by~//~@sanober._.masood \n#urduquotes #urdupoetry #urdu #urdushayari #urduadab #urduposts #urdupoetrylovers #poetry #urdulovers #shayari #urdushayri #pakistan #hindiquotes #urdulines #quotes #urduliterature #linespoetry #lahore #mohabbat #karachi #islam #madina #duaa

Caption:
Oleh karena itu, kita temukan bahwa Rasulullah shallaahu ‘alaihi wa sallam memikulkan tanggung jawab pendidikan anak ini secara utuh kepada kedua orang tua. Diriwayatkan dari Ibnu Umar radhiyaallaahu ‘anhu bahwa dia berkata,

“Aku mendengar Rasulullah shallaahu ‘alaihi wa sallam bersabda, ‘Seorang imam adalah pemimpin, dan ia bertanggung jawab atas rakyat yang dipimpinnya. Seorang laki-laki adalah pemimpin di keluarganya, dan ia bertanggung jawab atas keluarga yang dipimpinnya. Seorang wanita adalah pemimpin di rumah suaminya, dan ia bertanggung jawab atas apa yang dipimpinnya. Seorang pelayan adalah pemimpin terhadap harta milik tuannya dan ia bertanggung jawab atas apa yang dipimpinnya. Masing-masing kalian adalah pemimpin, dan akan bertanggung jawab atas rakyat yang dipimpinnya.” (Muttafaq ‘alaih)

Sampai-sampai Rasulullah shallallaahu’alaihi ‘alaihi wa sallam meletakkkan kaidah mendasar yang kesimpulannya adalah  seorang anak itu tumbuh dan berkembang mengikuti agama kedua orang tuanya. Keduanyalah yang memberikan pengaruh yang kuat terhadapnya.

Bukhari meriwayatkan bahwa Abu Hurairah radhiyaallaahu ‘anhu berkata, Rasulullah shallaahu ‘alaihi wa sallam bersabda,

“Tiada seorang bayi pun yang lahir melainkan dia dilahirkan di atas fitrah. Lalu kedua orang tuanya lah yang menjadikannya Yahudi, atau Majusi atau Nasrani; seperti binatang yang melahirkan binatang yang sama secara utuh. Adakah kamu menemukan adanya kebuntungan?” Kemudian Abu Hurairah radhiyaallaahu ‘anhu membaca firman Allah:

Tetaplah pada fitrah Allah yang telah menciptakan manusia menurut fitrah itu. Tidak ada perubahan pada fitrah Allah. Itulah agama yang lurus. (Ar-Ruum: 30)

Caption:
📿daily dhikr: 
33x سبحان الله 
33x الحمد لله 
34x اللّٰه اكبر
‎لا إلهَ إلا الله
‎لا حول ولا قوة إلا بالله 
‎استغفر الله 

‎سُبحان الله وبحمده
‎الحمدُ لله على كُل حال
‎سُبحان الله العَظيم
‎استغفر الله العَظيم وأتوب إليه 
رضيت بالله ربا و بالإسلام دينا و بمحمدٍ ﷺ نبيّا 

اللهم صلى وسلم وبارك على نبينا محمد 
‎لا إله إلا أنت سبحانك إني كنت من الظالمَين 
اشهد ان لا إله إلا الله و اشهد ان محمداً عبده ورسوله
‎اللَّهُم اسألك توبة قبل الموت
‎اللَّهُم اسألك الجنة
‎اللَّهُم أجرني من النار
‎اللَّهُم اسألك حسن الخاتمة

Rasulullah SAW bersabda, “Tidaklah duduk suatu kaum, kemudian mereka berzikir kepada Allah dalam duduknya hingga mereka berdiri, melainkan dikatakan oleh malaikat kepada mereka. Caption: People with pure intentions will inevitably find each other, as if drawn by an invisible force. Like attracts like, and kindness recognizes kindness. In a world where genuine connections seem scarce, these encounters shine like beacons of hope. When two pure hearts meet, they ignite a spark that illuminates the beauty of humanity. Their bond strengthens, forged in the fire of shared values and compassion. Together, they create a sanctuary of trust, empathy, and understanding. And as they journey through life, their connection deepens, a testament to the power of pure intentions and the universe’s gentle guidance.

Caption:
Gavs Hazretleri (k.s) sohbetlerinde, Suriye'ye Şah-ı Hazne'ye (k.s) gidip gelmesini şöyle naklederdi:
"O zaman Türkiye-Suriye hududu mayın döşeliydi. Kaçakçılığı engellemek için yapılmıştı. Yollarda eşkıyalar vardı. Vasıta bulmak da çok müşkil idi. Gündüzleri eşkıyadan saklanır, geceleri yaya olarak devam ederdik. Keçi derisinden yapılmış çarıklarımız yürümekten aşınır, delinir, ayaklarımız kan revan içinde kalırdı. 
Bir defasında gece vakti ırmaktan geçiyorduk. Yolumuzu bilmeyip ırmağın en derin yerine gitmişiz. Az kalsın boğuluyorduk. Biz ne zaman Şah-ı Hazne'ye (k.s) gitmek istesek evimizin ahalisi ağlardı. Çünkü huduttan Suriye'ye gidip dönen az olurdu. Kaçak geçenlere jandarma ateş açardı. Mayın ve eşkıya da vardı. Ama biz, ev halkının ağlamasına rağmen nefsimizle mücadele edip şu kararı verdik:
Eğer biz şeyhimize gidip gelmeyi terkeder, onun irşadından uzak kalırsak vallahi şeytan imanımızı çalar. Devam ettiğimiz takdirde olsa olsa cesedimiz ölür. İmanımızı kurtarmak için canımızı vermemiz daha kolaydır. Elhamdülillah, Şah-ı Hazne'ye gidenler içinde bizlere bir şey olmadı. O zaman Şah-ı Hazne (k.s) bize şöyle derdi: "Sizin muradınız Allah olsun. Eğer muradınız kaçakçılık olursa ilâhî maksadı zedelemiş olursunuz. Suriye'ye girip çıkarken kaçakçılığa niyet etmeyin ve kaçakçılık da yapmayın." 🌹. Gönderileri beğenerek ve kaydederek bizi destekleyebilirsiniz 🌹

Caption:
NOTE: If anything wrong in this post may Allah guide me and everyone who seeing this post.

1.Abu Hurairah (May Allah be pleased with him) reported:
The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said, "Allah makes the way to Jannah easy for him who treads the path in search of knowledge."

[Muslim].

2.Mu'awiyah (May Allah be pleased with him) reported:
The Messenger of Allah said, "When Allah wishes good for someone, He bestows upon him the understanding of Deen."

[Al-Bukhari and Muslim].

3.Abu Hurairah (May Allah be pleased with him) reported:
The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said, "He who calls others to follow the Right Guidance will have a reward equal to the reward of those who follow him, without their reward being diminished in any respect on that account."

[Muslim].
#hadiths #hadees #muslim #muslimah #ilmu #ilm #islam #islamic #knowledgeispower #knowledge #bettermuslim

Caption:
📿daily dhikr: 
33x سبحان الله 
33x الحمد لله 
34x اللّٰه اكبر
‎لا إلهَ إلا الله
‎لا حول ولا قوة إلا بالله 
‎استغفر الله 

‎سُبحان الله وبحمده
‎الحمدُ لله على كُل حال
‎سُبحان الله العَظيم
‎استغفر الله العَظيم وأتوب إليه 
رضيت بالله ربا و بالإسلام دينا و بمحمدٍ ﷺ نبيّا 

اللهم صلى وسلم وبارك على نبينا محمد 
‎لا إله إلا أنت سبحانك إني كنت من الظالمَين 
اشهد ان لا إله إلا الله و اشهد ان محمداً عبده ورسوله
‎اللَّهُم اسألك توبة قبل الموت
‎اللَّهُم اسألك الجنة
‎اللَّهُم أجرني من النار
‎اللَّهُم اسألك حسن الخاتمة

Caption:
NEW !! The Boldest White: A Story of Hijab and Community

In this call to bravery from Olympic medalist Ibtihaj Muhammad, Faizah learns to overcome her fears and stand in front of the crowd in this beautiful celebration of family, fencing, and community. Faizah loves being part of the community at her mosque, and she loves being part of the group at her fencing lessons. When all eyes are on her, though, Faizah freezes up. Mama says bravery will come with time, but there’s a fencing tournament coming up—does Faizah have what it takes to be bold?Love, honesty, and courage shine through every page of this empowering picture book from the bestselling, award-winning team behind The Proudest Blue and The Kindest Red. Caption:
Anak adalah amanah bagi kedua orang tuanya. Maka, kita sebagai orang tua bertanggung jawab terhadap amanah ini. Tak sedikit kesalahan dan kelalaian dalam mendidik anak telah menjadi fenomena yang nyata. Sungguh merupakan malapetaka besar, dan termasuk mengkhianati amanah Allah.

Adapun rumah, adalah sekolah pertama bagi anak. Kumpulan dari beberapa rumah itu akan membentuk sebuah bangunan masyarakat.

Bagi seorang anak, sebelum mendapatkan pendidikan di sekolah dan masyarakat, ia akan mendapatkan pedidikan di rumah dan keluarganya. Ia merupakan prototipe kedua orang tuanya dalam berinteraksi sosial. Oleh karena itu, disinilah peran dan tanggung jawab orang tua, dituntut untuk tidak lalai dalam mendidik anak-anak.

Bahaya lalai Dalam Mendidik Anak
Orang tua memiliki hak yang wajib dilaksanakan oleh anak-anaknya. Demikian pula anak, juga mempunyai hak yang wajib dipikul oleh kedua orang tuanya. Disamping Allah memerintahkan kita untuk berbakti kepada kedua orang tua, Allah juga memerintahkan kita untuk berbuat baik (ihsan) kepada anak-anak serta bersungguh-sungguh dalam mendidiknya. Demikian ini termasuk bagian dari menunaikan amanah Allah. Sebaliknya, melalaikan hak-hak mereka termasuk perbuatan khianat terhadap amanah Allah. Banyak nash-nash syar’i yang mengisyaratkannya. Allah berfirman.

إِنَّ اللهَ يَأْمُرُكُمْ أَن تُؤَدُّوا اْلأَمَانَاتِ إِلَى أَهْلِهَا

Sesungguhnya Allah menyuruh kamu menyampaikan amanah kepada yang berhak menerimanya…[An Nisa’/4 : 58].

يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا لاَ تَخُونُوا اللهَ وَالرَّسُولَ وَتَخُونُوا أَمَانَاتِكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ

Hai orang-orang yang beriman, janganlah kamu mengkhianati Allah dan Rasul (Muhammad) dan (juga) janganlah kamu mengkhianati amanat-amanat yang dipercayakan kepadamu, sedang kamu mengetahui. [Al Anfal/8 : 27].

Referensi : https://almanhaj.or.id/3007-sepuluh-kesalahan-dalam-mendidik-anak.html

Caption:
In this hadith, Sahl ibn Abi Hathmah narrates that the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: “If one of you prays towards a sutrah,” meaning: if the person praying takes a sutrah, which is a barrier and obstacle that he places in front of him so that no one can pass by while he is praying. In Sahih Muslim, the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: “If one of you places in front of him something like the back of a saddle, then let him pray, and he should not care who passes behind that,” and the back of a saddle is the stick that is at the end of the saddle and is estimated at a cubit or two-thirds of a cubit. “Let him draw near to it,” meaning: let him get close to this sutrah and this obstacle. The minimum limit for drawing near and being close to the sutrah is what is sufficient for bowing and prostrating and being able to push away the person who passes between the person praying and his sutrah, “so that Satan does not interrupt his prayer,” meaning: so that Satan does not interrupt his prayer by distracting him from communing with his Lord by any means or by another person or animal passing by and interrupting his prayer. It is attributed to Satan because interrupting and invalidating worship is one of the actions of Satan.  al-Durar al-Saniyyah-

في هذا الحديث يخبر سهل بن أبي حثمة أن النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم قال: "إذا صلى أحدكم إلى سترة"، أي: إذا اتخذ المصلي سترة؛ وهي الحائل والمانع الذي يضعه أمامه حتى لا يمر أحد وهو يصلي، وفي صحيح مسلم أن النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم قال: "إذا وضع أحدكم بين يديه مثل مؤخرة الرحل فليصل، ولا يبال من مر وراء ذلك"، ومؤخرة الرحل هو العود الذي يكون في آخرة الرحل ويقدر بذراع أو ثلثي ذراع، "فليدن منها"، أي: فليقترب من هذه السترة وهذا الحائل، وحد الدنو والقرب من السترة أقله ما يكفي للركوع والسجود والتمكن من دفع المار بين المصلي وسترته، "لا يقطع الشيطان عليه صلاته"، أي: حتى لا يقطع الشيطان عليه صلاته؛ بأن يشغله عن مناجاة ربه بأي وسيلة أو بأن يمر إنسان آخر أو حيوان، فيقطع عليه الصلاة؛ وإنما نسب إلى الشيطان لأن قطع العبادة وإبطالها من أعمال الشيطان. -الدرر السنية-

📎 KEBATILAN PASTI BERAKHIR

Al-Imam Muhammad bin Ali asy-Syaukany rahimahullah berkata,

إن الباطل وإن ظهر على الحق في بعض الأحوال وعلاه، فإن الله سيمحقه ويبطله ويجعل العاقبة للحق وأهله

"Walaupun kebatilan mengalahkan dan mengungguli kebenaran pada keadaan tertentu, Allah pasti akan melenyapkan dan menghancurkannya. Allah juga akan menjadikan kesudahan yang baik bagi kebenaran dan orang-orang yang mengikutinya."

📚 Fathul Qadir, jilid 3 hlm. 91

🎙Sufyan ats-Tsauri rahimahullahu berkata,

أَكْثِرِ الاِسْتِغْفَارَ مِمَّا قَدْ سَلَفَ مِنْ ذُنُوْبِكَ وَسَلِ اللهَ السَّلاَمَةَ لِمَا بَقِيَ مِنْ عُمُرِكَ.

“Perbanyaklah istigfar untuk dosa-dosamu yang telah lalu, dan mohonlah keselamatan kepada Allah untuk yang tersisa dari usiamu.”

📕 Hilyatul Auliya’, 7/82.

Caption:
@nazimalifoundation PRESENTS @aromes92 DAY OF GIVING TO PROVIDE FOOD PARCELS TO THE POOR IN POVERTY-STRICKEN AFGHANISTAN 🇦🇫 

TOMORROW: SUNDAY 29th SEPTEMBER 2024 FROM 4PM TO 9:30PM 

AROMÈ (Specialists in Steak), 1300 Leeds Road, Bradford, BD3 8PF, Tel: (01274) 490644 

COLLECTIONS & CASH ONLY 

All collection order sale proceeds of the day will go to @greencrescentaid (100% Donation Policy) fundraising to provide Food Parcels to the Poor in poverty-stricken Afghanistan 🇦🇫. 

Whilst customers will enjoy their meals, they will also get the reward of contributing to charity & helping some of the most needy brothers and sisters. 

This initiative has been organised by the Nazim Ali Foundation in association with Green Crescent Aid UK.

Caption:
An imam was attacked whilst leading prayers in Türkiye. 

The attacker entered the masjid, took a chair and began hitting the imam on the head whilst he was leading Salah. Some of the worshippers then hit him, including an elderly man who struck the attacker on the head with a fan. The attacker tried to escape but was arrested before he left.

Caption:
Too many signs of the end yet we are still heedless. 

Allah said:

"Closer and closer to mankind comes their Reckoning: yet they heed not and they turn away."

[Al-Qur'an 21:1]

"Are they waiting for anything except the Hour, to come to them suddenly? But its Signs have already come!" 

[Al-Qur'an 47:18]

Prepare for the hereafter every day and be repentful. Your death and the grave is the stage of the hereafter. Don’t waste your time chasing frivolous things while death is chasing you.

Be obedient to Allah alone, safeguard His wajib duties and follow the sunnah and make Du’a to Allah to die as a Muslim in a righteous state. 

May Allah guide us all to what pleases Him alone.

Caption:
[Q100:1] By the (steeds) that run, with panting [horses].
[Q100:2] Striking sparks of fire (by their hooves).
[Q100:6] Verily, man (disbeliever) is ungrateful to his Lord.
[Q100:7] And to that he bears witness (by his deeds).

“An example of stallions (in war) is given to reflect on human attitude towards Allah(swt). Stallions provided only food & water are so grateful they jump into the valley of death - while man whom Allah has given life, food, provisions is ungrateful. An ungrateful person is worse than an animal.”

Caption:
Sextourismus in #Marokko: eine florierende Industrie, die gegen die Rechte der Kinder verstößt

Es wurde dokumentiert, dass marokkanische Kinder zu sexuellen Zwecken nach Europa und in den Nahen Osten verschleppt wurden, und es wurde festgestellt, dass auch Ausländer an der sexuellen Ausbeutung von Kindern auf Reisen und im Tourismus innerhalb der marokkanischen Grenzen beteiligt waren. Unabhängig davon wurden in Marokko zwischen 2012 und 2015 400 Opfer des Kinderhandels gemeldet, von denen die meisten als Opfer des Menschenhandels zum Zwecke der sexuellen Ausbeutung identifiziert wurden (Prafcke, 2021).
Zusätzlich zu diesem alarmierenden Kontext werden die Zahlen und Statistiken zur sexuellen Ausbeutung in Marokko stark unterschätzt, da es in Marokko keine Datenerfassung und keine Identifizierung der Opfer gibt (Fondation Scelles, 2016).Tatsächlich ist es schwierig, das genaue Ausmaß der sexuellen Ausbeutung von Kindern in Marokko zu ermitteln, da die Datenerhebung zu diesem Thema unzureichend ist (Fondation Scelles, 2016).

DANN NENNT IHR EUCH NOCH MUSLIME, ODER SEID STOLZ AUF #Marokko 

Gootlose , Ehrenlose Viecher seit ihr ! Mehr nicht 💘💘💘

Caption:
Assalaamu'alaikum Warahmatullaah Wabarakaatuh...
Sahabat alQur'an, semoga Allaah selalu lindungi dan senantiasa istqomah dalam kebaikan.
.
*Kenapa kita harus wakaf alQuran?*
Karena itu merupakan suatu amalan yang pahalanya akan terus mengalir meskipun pewakafnya sudah meninggal dunia, selain itu juga bermanfaat bagi pribadi dan akan bermanfaat juga untuk anak cucu kelak.
.
Dari Abdullah bin Mas’ud berkata, bahwa Rasulullah Shalallaahu 'Alaihi Wa Sallam bersabda :
_“Siapa yang membaca satu huruf dari Al-Quran, maka baginya satu kebaikan dengan bacaan tersebut. Satu kebaikan itu dilipatgandakan menjadi 10 kebaikan semisalnya, dan aku tidak mengatakan Alif Laam Miim itu satu huruf, akan tetapi Alif satu huruf, Lam satu huruf dan Mim satu huruf.”_ (HR. Tirmidzi no 6469)
.
Setiap ayat yang dibaca berulang-ulang oleh para santri penghafal alQuran, Insyaa Allaah mengalir juga amalannya untuk para pemberi sedekah. Aamiin Allaahumma Aamiin..
.
Yuk sama-sama kita wujudkan dengan berwakaf mushaf alQuran untuk para santri Rumah Qur'an Mab'utsul Abna'. In syaa Allah jika ini untuk para generasi penghafal alQuran, kebaikan yang kita lakukan ini tak akan mengakibatkan kerugian akan tetapi malah sebaliknya yaitu keberkahan hidup karena apa yang kita berikan akan menjadi pahala jariyah yang tak akan pernah terputus.
.
.
.
.
.

Caption:
Sabr, or patience, is a vital virtue in Islam, essential for navigating life's challenges and trials. Allah (SWT) repeatedly emphasizes the importance of sabr in the Quran, promising rewards and blessings for those who persevere. Sabr is not merely tolerance or endurance; it's an active process of trusting Allah's plan, submitting to His will, and maintaining faith despite adversity. The Prophet Muhammad (SAW) exemplified sabr, facing persecution, hardship, and loss with unwavering resolve. Through sabr, believers can transform struggles into opportunities for spiritual growth, developing resilience, empathy, and wisdom. Sabr helps us focus on the Akhirah (Hereafter), recognizing that worldly difficulties are temporary and that Allah's promise is true. By cultivating sabr, Muslims can:
- Endure hardships with hope and faith
- Resist temptation and sinful impulses
- Build strong relationships through forgiveness and understanding
- Trust Allah's wisdom and sovereignty
- Attain spiritual maturity and closeness to Allah

Caption:
"BEDİR DUASI"
Habbab bin eret ( r.a) dan rivayetle 
Efendimiz Hz Muhammed Mustafa (s.a.v) şöyle buyuruymuşlar.
Efendimiz Bedir yaşanmadan önce sabah fecre kadar Allah azze ve celle'ye dua ediyor

Bedir savaşından önce sahabenin de çok şaşırdığı Allah Resulü Aleyhissalatı ve Selem,in bir duası ve dua hâli var.

Elleri havada cübbesi üstünden düşercesine ufak bir tepenin üstünde kendisine bir yer yaptırıp sabaha kadar dua etmiştir. 
Duanın sonunda fecir vakti Habbab bin eret Allah resulünün yanına gidiyor 
Ya Resulullah ne bu hal nasıl bir dua böyle ne istedin ben seni gördüm ve çok etkilendim çok şaşırdım diyor.
Ya  Habbap ben Allah azze ve Celle'den üç şey istedim,ikisi kabul edildi birisi kabul edilmedi 

Birincisi; dedim ki;Ya rab benim ümmetimi toplu helak etme, Allah azze ve celle bunu kabul etti.

İkinisi; dedim ki;Ya rab düşmanı ümmetin üstüne sürekli galebe ettirme,bunu da kabul etti.

Üçüncüsü'de dedim ki; Ya rab ümmetime tefrika,ayrılık bulaştırma bunu kabul etmedi.

Tefrika,ayrılıklar bu ümmetin imtihanı olacak.
Allah azze ve celle bu işin ince detaylarını Kader detaylarını bu şekilde örmüş.

Neden sorusunun cevabını ancak imanda derinleşmiş insanlar bir nebze anlayabilecekler.
Bu günlerde bazı cahillerin dediği gibi bu müslüman coğrafyalarda neden hep ayrılıklar var, neden hep zulümler var, neden bu şekilde işkenceler var

Müslümanların olduğu yerde huzur olması lazım,demek ki bu din hâşâ batıldır diyen bazı cahillerin dediği gibi demememiz lazım bu işin imtihanı tefrikadan gelecek ayrılıklar dan gelecek

Bu işte birleştericiler en zirve sevabı alacak çünkü imtihanın en ağır olduğu duanın kabul edilmediği yer tefrika.

Üç kişi Çay içmeye birilerini davet edip orada birlik sağlasanız hemde o üç kişi hep aynı meşrep adamlar da değil
Müslüman'sa baş tacı bunun Sevap değeri çok yüksek olacak.bazı cahiller gibi neden İslam'ın olduğu yerde ayrılıklar var,dememek icap ediyor.

Caption:
The Uganda National Masjid is a Masjid located at Kampala Hill in the Old Kampala area of Kampala, Uganda. It is the largest mosque in East Africa[1] in a country where, as of 2014, 13.7% of the population is Muslim.[2] Completed in 2006, it seats up to 15,000 worshipers and can hold another 1,100 in the gallery, while the terrace will cater for another 3,500. Colonel Muammar Gaddafi of Libya commissioned the Masjid as a gift to Uganda, and for the benefit of the Muslim population. Uganda has many Masjids but this one is a skyscraper, abd one of the most known places in Uganda

Caption:
"What islam teaches us about gratitude in times of hardships" :- 📜💝

🍃 Gratefulness for the Relief Promised to Us.
🍃 Opportunity to come closer to Allah (SWT).
🍃 Opportunity to Become More Humble.
🍃 Gratefulness brings an increase in blessings.
🍃 Gratitude for the removal of sins.
🍃 Blessings of surrender to Allah's decree.
🍃 Gratitude for the good we may not be able to see.
🍃 Hardships are sent because of Allah's love for Us.

your Lord proclaimed, 'If you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor]; but if you deny, indeed, My punishment is severe. '” 📜🔥

The Prophet, peace and blessings be upon him, said: "Allah is pleased with His servant if, when he eats something, he thanks Allah for it, and when he drinks something, he thanks Allah for it" (Muslim).🩷️📖

Caption:
Marwa and the Moon

Synopsis:
By the end of her 5th grade math class, Marwa is reminded of her math test the next day; which happens to be on the same day as Eid Al-Fitr. Marwa tries her best to convince her family to let her miss out their Eid celebrations - until she realizes the importance of her family’s holiday.

Caption:
AI generated picture.

Ensiksi oli sanottava tuo.

Mietin tässä, että aika lailla tasan tarkalleen kaksi vuotta sitten käännyin muslimiksi tai palasin Islamiin, kuten ehkä on oikeammin sanottu. En muista tarkkaa päivää, mutta sen muistan, että syyskuun lopussa tuo päivä oli.

Joten mietin, että nyt on hyvä hetki muistella miten elämäni on muuttunut tässä kahden vuoden aikana.

Olen löytänyt jonkinlaisen rauhan. Ennen saatoin saada paniikkikohtauksia useasti ja mieliala oli monesti hyvinkin musta. Tässä edeltävän kahden vuoden aikana paniikkikohtauksia ei ole tullut oikeastaan ollenkaan ja mielialakin ollut huonoimmillaan vain "blue". Myös masentavat mielialat ovat väistyneet helpommin kuin ennen. Tämä ei siis tarkoita, että elämä olisi vain pelkkää iloa ja onnea, vaan nimenomaan rauhaa, koska ikävät mielialat eivät jää niin sanotusti päälle.

Elämääni on tullut parempi rytmi. Rukoukset selkeästi rytmittävät elämää ja tämä vaikuttaa kaikkeen: nukkumiseen, syömiseen ja ruutuaikaan.

Näin muslimi naisena suuri muutos on tietysti myös pukeutuminen. Olen alkanut peittämään pääni ja muutenkin pukeutuminen muuttunut.

Varmasti on muutakin mitä on muuttunut, mutta nyt ei tule mieleen muuta.

Loppuun vielä todettava, että Alhamdulillah.

Caption:
Berbai'at kepada utusan Allah Ta'ala bagaikan kita berjalan pada sebuah jembatan yang berada tepat di atas jurang. Dengan berbai'at, kita tak hanya mengikat diri dengan kesetiaan kepada utusan-Nya, tetapi juga mengikat diri dalam kesetiaan kepada Allah Ta'ala.

Mempersiapkan diri untuk senantiasa sigap pada seruannya dan mengatakan 'labbaik', kita sebenarnya menyatakan kesiapan penuh untuk memenuhi panggilan Allah Ta'ala.

Sungguh, ini adalah janji yang agung, yang didalamnya kita akan selalu berkomitmen untuk melintasi jalan milik Allah Ta'ala dan melakukan penghambaan total yang menuntut kita untuk selalu berada dalam naungan cahaya-Nya, serta menjadikan kehidupan kita senantiasa selaras dengan ajaran-Nya.

Untuk itu, segeralah berbai'at, supaya engkau senantiasa mendapat petunjuk yang benar. 🌹🕊️

– Yesiska Ikhsan Q @yyessiska

Caption:
Is rain considered a blessing in islam?
Rain, as you know, is incredibly important. It is a vital source of life that nourishes the earth, helping crops to grow and ensuring that animals and plants thrive. Without rain, rivers would dry up, forests would wither, and life would struggle to survive.

 Allah, in His wisdom, provides rain to sustain all of creation. However, rain can also be a test or a punishment.

 Too much rain can lead to devastating floods, while too little can cause droughts, both of which disrupt life. This delicate balance reminds us of our dependence on Allah's mercy and provision.

.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.

Caption:
🎀 Evening Azkaar🎀

🪻 1⃣ _Shield of Protection from Allah Recite 👇🏻_

*Ayat-ul-Kursi × 1time*

🪻2⃣ _*Protection from Every Harm"* 👇🏻_

*Surah Al-Ikhlas × 3 , Surah Al-Falaq × 3, and  Surah An-Naas × 3.*

🪻 3⃣_*"Seeking Mercy from the Ever-Living by Reciting 👇🏻💜"*_ Once

*"Ya Hayyu, Ya Qayyum, bi rahmatika astagheeth, aslih li sha'ni kullahu, wa la takilni ila nafsi tarfata 'ayn" × 1*

 🪻 4⃣ _*For protection from calamities*_👇🏻 Thrice

*"Bismillahilladhi la yadurru ma'asmihi shay'un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'i wa huwa as-sami'ul 'aleem" × 3*

🪻5⃣ _*"Living by His Will, Night and Day"*_ Recite this Dua👇🏻

*"Allahumma bika amsayna wa bika asbahna, wa bika nahya wa bika namootu wa ilaykan-nushoor" × 1* 

🪻6⃣  _*Have the Prophet (Swallallahu alaihi wa sallam) Hold your Hand and Enter you to Paradise*_ Recite this Dua👇🏻

*"Radheetu billahi Rabban wa bil-Islami deenan wa bi-Muhammadin Swallallahu 'alayhi wa sallam nabiyyan" × 3* 

🪻7⃣ _*"Gratitude for Every Blessing: Acknowledging Allah’s Favors"*_ Recite Once👇🏻

*"Allahumma maa amsaa bee min ni’matin aw bi-ahadin min khalqika faminka wahdaka laa shareeka laka falakal-hamdu wa lakash-shukr."* × 1

🪻 8⃣_*"Seeking Refuge in Allah's Perfect Words"*_ Recite thrice 👇🏻💜

*"A'udhu bikalimaatillahi-taammaati min sharri ma khalaq" × 3*

🪻9⃣ _*Allah Will Suffice You in Everything*_ Recite 7times👇🏻

*Ḥasbiya-Allāhu lā ilāha illā Huwa, ʿalayhi tawakkalt, wa Huwa Rabbu-l-ʿArshi-l-ʿaẓīm.* × 7

🪻1⃣0⃣_*Ask Allah for Good Health and Protection*_ Recite thrice 👇🏻

*Allāhumma ʿāfinī fī badanī, Allāhumma ʿāfinī fī samʿī, Allāhumma ʿāfinī fī baṣarī, lā ilāha illā Ant, Allāhumma innī aʿūdhu bika mina-l-kufri wa-l-faqr, wa aʿūdhu bika min ʿadhābi-l-qabr, lā ilāha illā Ant. ×3*

Caption:
📝#PosterAFN
. 
Menunda Pernikahan Si Adik Karena Kakak Belum Menikah
. 
Al-Allamah Abdul Aziz bin Baaz rahimahullah berkata,
. 
"Tidak boleh menunda pernikahan anak wanita yang lebih muda usianya untuk menunggu kakak perempuannya menikah. Karena itu bentuk kezaliman terhadap si adik dan bisa jadi penyebab kedua- duanya terlantar."

(Majmu' Fatawa, XX/420 melalui Al-Ikhtiyaraat hlm. 477)

Caption:
Le Prophète ﷺ a dit :

من صنع إليه معروف، فقال لفاعله: (جزاك الله خيرا)؛ فقد أبلغ في الثناء

Quiconque dira à celui qui lui aura rendu service : « Qu’Allah te rétribue en bien » aura certainement atteind le sumum de l’éloge.

‎جَزَاكَ اللهُ خَيْراً - Jazâka-llâhu khayrâ.

Sahih Targhib n°969

Caption:
"Artık rabbinin hangi nimetlerinden şüphe duyabilirsin? / Bu (Kur’an) da önceki uyarıcılar gibi bir uyarıcıdır. / Artık yaklaştı o yaklaşmakta olan. / Onu Allah’tan başka ortaya çıkaracak yoktur. / Yoksa bu haberi tuhaf mı buluyorsunuz? / Ağlayacağınıza gülüyorsunuz! / Ve gaflet içinde oyalanıp duruyorsunuz. / Haydi artık Allah için secdeye kapanıp kulluk ediniz."

(Necm Suresi - 55-62 Ayet Meali)

Caption:
Resilient Smiles

Synopsis:
Embark on a poignant journey in our documentary, 'Resilient Smiles,' as we delve into the untold living struggles of Palestinian refugees in Lebanon. Through intimate first-hand interviews, witness the profound impact of the recent war in Palestine on these inspiring individuals, shedding light on their resilience, struggles, and unwavering spirit in the face of adversity. This compelling narrative captures the essence of their stories, providing a powerful glimpse into the interconnected lives of those affected by the ongoing challenges in the region.

Caption:
Zikri yaparsanız, Allah'ın size verdiği ilk şey olan huzuru tadacaksınız. Sen Allah'ı seviyorsun ama Allah seni daha çok seviyor. Bu bilince yaşayarak ve görerek ulaşıyorsunuz. Allah seni zikrine almış, kabul etmiş. Allah istemezse hiçbir şey yapamayacağınız gibi, tövbe de edemezsiniz. Biz tövbeyi geçtik, Salavat-ı Şerifleri de yapıp hediyemizi gönderiyoruz, üstüne bir de Tevhidimizi yapıyoruz. Demek ki Allah bizi kat be kat sevmiş. Rabbim seni seviyorum ve teslim oldum, hakkımda hayırlısını ver deyin.
